de.dipf.edutec.thriller.experiencesampling.activities

Class LoginActivity.LoginTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.os.AsyncTask<String,Void,Intent>
      • de.dipf.edutec.thriller.experiencesampling.activities.LoginActivity.LoginTask
  • Enclosing class:
    LoginActivity

    private static class LoginActivity.LoginTask
extends AsyncTask<String,Void,Intent>

    Connects to the MQTT broker to verify user credentials.

    If the connection was established successfully, it is disconnected subsequently and the account is stored through AccountManager.addAccountExplicitly(Account, String, Bundle). If the client is already connected, the account is not added again. In both cases, AccountAuthenticatorActivity.setAccountAuthenticatorResult(Bundle) is called with the successful result of the authentication and the activity finishes. Any other type of error will not result in the activity to finish but rather keep it active.
